author: erwan
msg: OFBIZ-3858 - a patch from David Cervera - Spanish title of Catalog app is wrong

author: jochen
msg: Added a check for file names containing a NULL characters. Such file names are now triggering an InvalidFileNameException since the file name cannot be used as provided to create the file since it will be truncated at the NULL character on most (all?) operating systems. E.g. a file name like test.foo0.bar would result in test.foo being created.

author: bodewig
msg: build Axiom prior to RAT so it can use the 0.6 version of the RAT Maven plugin
